item.description:
We have decided to schedule a walk at 9am every Saturday! Please note that organizers will not always be there to lead the pack, so I will leave it up to the people that show up to find each other. An hour of sun, swimming and fun! Location may change in the future.

I will be away this weekend, so please let me know if you would like to lead this particular pack walk. Thank you
item.how_to_find_us: At the front gate with my australian shepherd

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: Saturday Morning Pack Walk
